evidence.claim: Spect Inc. utilizes AWS cloud services to host its applications.
The platform supports FHIR standards for healthcare data exchange.
Spect Inc. adheres to HIPAA compliance for handling patient data.
Integration with EHR systems is facilitated through HL7 protocols.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of focusing on X12 or EDI clearinghouse use cases found on the website.
